name: Gimmick Puppet
description:
Game Preview

This game base on scriptwriter point of view, similarity of characters, names, or story, is inadvertent. Its about slice of what happen in real life, and tweak it to get  better story and giving "novel" experience. 

Introduction

Hi, my name is ramdhanstst and I'm from Indonesia. I just try start doing this game development so I'm still far from good, its only a glimpse of what I capable of. And I willing to push myself to get better result for my own practice. Thank you for playing this game and any supportive comment will be motivated me to make this and next project better.
